summary: The diff implements a substantial portion of the GreenChef SaaS app including the Motoko backend, React frontend pages, authentication, recipe generation, saved recipes, meal planner, admin panel, pricing/Stripe integration, and design system. Most core requirements appear addressed. However, several specific acceptance criteria have gaps or cannot be confirmed from the truncated diff, particularly around the actual logo/hero image static assets, favicon setup, PDF download functionality, and the precision of the color scheme matching.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a branded app logo image (greenchef-logo.dim_256x256.png) stored in frontend/public/assets/generated; logo rendered in navbar and landing page hero; favicon uses the same logo icon.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the Navbar uses a Lucide ChefHat icon component instead of the actual generated image asset. No evidence of greenchef-logo.dim_256x256.png being added to frontend/public/assets/generated, and no favicon configuration is visible in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate a hero background illustration (hero-kitchen.dim_1440x600.png) stored in frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: LandingPage.tsx references the image at '/assets/generated/hero-kitchen.dim_1440x600.png', but the actual image file is not present in the listed diff files. The diff summary notes 9 added files were omitted due to limits, so the file may exist but cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Download PDF button is enabled for Pro/Premium users.
missing_requirements.reason: RecipeCard.tsx is truncated and the Download PDF implementation cannot be confirmed. The file references a Download icon import but full PDF generation logic is not visible.

missing_requirements.requirement: On successful payment callback, user's plan_type is updated to 'pro' or 'premium' correctly based on which plan was purchased.
missing_requirements.reason: PaymentSuccessPage.tsx hardcodes upgradePlan.mutateAsync(PlanType.pro) regardless of which plan was purchased, so premium subscribers would incorrectly be upgraded to pro instead of premium.

missing_requirements.requirement: Nutrition breakdown section is visible on recipe cards for Premium users.
missing_requirements.reason: RecipeCard.tsx is truncated and the nutrition breakdown rendering for Premium users cannot be fully confirmed, though a nutrition field exists in the ParsedRecipe interface.

hallucinated_features.description: A caffeine.ai branding link is included in the global footer of every page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention or request any caffeine.ai attribution or footer branding. This was added without being requested.

hallucinated_features.description: PaymentSetup component allowing admin to configure Stripe secret key and allowed countries via the UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies Stripe Checkout integration but does not request an in-app Stripe configuration UI panel where admins can enter secret keys. This is an extra feature not in the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode CSS variables defined in index.css.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies a green color scheme with exact hex values but does not mention dark mode support. Dark mode theme variables are included without being requested.
